name: Repeating lines
description: P5JS experiment with pseudo-3d moving lines as a refreser for myself. Rows of moving lines in a purple gradient. Lines are drawn withiin a for-loop. Their rotation is based on a framerate of the canvas.
background: It is an attempt to make pseudo-3d graphics. Lines are moving in 2D with lerp() function based on the framerate. Repeatings patterns create visual harmony and rythm

name: Rectangles and circles
description: Static art with randomly placed figures.
background: Rectangles and circles are randomly placed on the canvas. Each element also has random color

name: Maze 1
background: Variant of maze.js. This time half-circles are used instead of lines

name: Grey noise layers
description: Reocurring grey layers. The noise is generated with the noise() function.
background: Color pallete is based on dull colors - grey and black.

name: Gradient flowfield
description: Points are evenly sprayed across the screen. Points move in a direction defined with noise() and vectors.
background: Gradient colors and a lot of gradually appearing points made with Perlin noise result in a calm and relaxing animation.
